title: Amputee

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose to put players on a Spare list, preventing them from being killed by your rampages.
- At night, rampage at someone's house, powerfully attacking all players.
- Each time you rampage, you lose a Limb.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with 3 Limbs.
- After losing a limb, you're roleblocked the next night to get surgery. When you're out of Limbs, you can't rampage anymore.
- When you are attacked or poisoned, you lose a Limb, even if you're healed.
